mapper.select: select to_char(rvw_input_date,'YYYY') yeardate, to_char(rvw_input_date,'Q') quater, sum(rvw_hygiene) hygiene, sum(rvw_comfort) comfort, SUM(rvw_technique) technique, SUM(rvw_PRICE) price, SUM(rvw_SERVICE) service from review where Etp_num = 99 group by to_char(rvw_input_date,'YYYY'), to_char(rvw_input_date,'Q') order by to_char(rvw_input_date,'YYYY'), to_char(rvw_input_date,'Q')
